ui

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Menu()
      Name:Menu Menu class constructor.creates the instance of the Scanner, in. and the principal class (Ship) instance, the pirate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOrder(int owner)
      Name: addOrder. create a new order by reading and validating all the invidual information needed to create an order. then adds the order to the ship client orders arraylist.
      boolean checkOption(double option, double min, double max)
      Name: checkOption. checks if an number given is in between other two numbers, if its not, shows an error message, and then gives a trut value dependig if the number given meets the conditions.
      void confirmOrder(int owner)
      Name: confirmOrder. shows a message to comfirm or discard the order, and with a switch loop, runs either comfirm, that adds the order to the client orders arraylist or discard, that errases that order from the shipments arraylist
      model.Date enterDate()
      Name: enterDate. reads a date, validates if its a valid expedition date, if it is, creates a new expedition date if is not, shows an error message. does this inside a dowhile loop until the user inputs a valid date. finally returns that date.
      void pressEnterToContinue()
      Name: pressEnterToContinue. shows a message to press enter, reads any input.
      double readDouble()
      Name: readDouble it read a double number and returns that number.
      int readInt()
      Name:readInt it read an integer number and returns that number.
      void runOption(int option)
      Name: runOption. with a swich loop, runs all the options avalible in the interface menu, depending what option the user wants to use.
      void runOptionMakeOrder()
      Name: runOptionMakeOrder. the user selects an owner with the selectOwner method, and then it adds an order with the addOrder method.
      void runOptionMakeTrip()
      Name: runOptionMakeTrip. shows that the trip is made, shows the info of the trip, and unloads the ship.
      void RunOptionShowClientData()
      Name: RunOptionShowClientData. shows the registered clients, the user picks one of them, then it shows the information asociated with that client.
      void runOptionShowOrders()
      Name: runOptionShowOrders. shows the information realted to the each order from the shipments arraylist thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined.
      void runOptionShowShipStatus()
      Name: runOptionShowShipStatus. shows the information realted to the ship object, thePirate.
      void runOptionUnloadShip()
      Name: runOptionUnloadShip. the user chosses to either unload the ship fully, or unload a single order. if unload the whole ship, it calls the method thePirate.unloadShip. if unload an order, it shows all the orders and the user picks one to unload and then calls the method thePirate.unloadOrder.
      void runOptionUpdateClientData()
      Name: runOptionUpdateClientData. shows the registered clients, the user picks one of them, then it shows what information can the user change from that client, the user selects what to modify with the shitch, based on that option reads the new information, and sets this new information to the client.
      int selectOwner()
      Name: selectOwner. shows the registered clients, the user picks one of them.
      void showError(int qBoxes, double weightOfBoxes, int type)
      Name: showError. shows an error message for when a client tryes to add a new order with invalid information, that doesnt meet the requirements to add a new order.
      void showPrincipalMenu()
      Name: showPrincipalMenu it shows the pricipal menu interface.
      void showWellcome()
      Name:showWellcome it shows a wellcome message for the begining of the program.
      void startProgram()
      Name: startProgram. shows a wellcome message, then shows the principal menu, reads the option selected, and runs that option, repeats until the user selects exit in the pricipal menu

      • runOptionUpdateClientData

        public void runOptionUpdateClientData()
        Name: runOptionUpdateClientData. shows the registered clients, the user picks one of them, then it shows what information can the user change from that client, the user selects what to modify with the shitch, based on that option reads the new information, and sets this new information to the client. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. clients array size must be diferent from 0.

      • runOptionMakeOrder

        public void runOptionMakeOrder()
        Name: runOptionMakeOrder. the user selects an owner with the selectOwner method, and then it adds an order with the addOrder method. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. clients array size must be diferent from 0.

      • selectOwner

        public int selectOwner()
        Name: selectOwner. shows the registered clients, the user picks one of them. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. clients array size must be diferent from 0.

      • addOrder

        public void addOrder(int owner)
        Name: addOrder. create a new order by reading and validating all the invidual information needed to create an order. then adds the order to the ship client orders arraylist.
        Parameters:
        owner - must represent a valid index in the array clients therefore it must be in between cero and clients array size. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. clients array size must be diferent from 0. orders arraylist must be previously defined.

      • showError

        public void showError(int qBoxes,
                      double weightOfBoxes,
                      int type)
        Name: showError. shows an error message for when a client tryes to add a new order with invalid information, that doesnt meet the requirements to add a new order. and displays the reason why it cannot be added as a new order
        Parameters:
        qBoxes - must be in between one and MAX_VALUE.
        weightOfBoxes - must be in between cero (not including cero) and 28000.
        type - must be in between one and tree. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. shipments arraylist must be previously defined.

      • confirmOrder

        public void confirmOrder(int owner)
        Name: confirmOrder. shows a message to comfirm or discard the order, and with a switch loop, runs either comfirm, that adds the order to the client orders arraylist or discard, that errases that order from the shipments arraylist
        Parameters:
        owner - must represent a valid index in the array clients therefore it must be in between cero and clients array size. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. clients array size must be diferent from 0. orders arraylist must be previously defined.

      • runOptionShowOrders

        public void runOptionShowOrders()
        Name: runOptionShowOrders. shows the information realted to the each order from the shipments arraylist thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. shipments arraylist must be previously defined. shipments arraylist size must be greater than 0.

      • runOptionUnloadShip

        public void runOptionUnloadShip()
        Name: runOptionUnloadShip. the user chosses to either unload the ship fully, or unload a single order. if unload the whole ship, it calls the method thePirate.unloadShip. if unload an order, it shows all the orders and the user picks one to unload and then calls the method thePirate.unloadOrder. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. shipments arraylist must be previously defined. shipments arraylist size must be greater than 0.

      • runOptionMakeTrip

        public void runOptionMakeTrip()
        Name: runOptionMakeTrip. shows that the trip is made, shows the info of the trip, and unloads the ship. thePirate object from Ship class, must be already defined. shipments arraylist must be previously defined. shipments arraylist size must be greater than 0.
